text: Hello everyone! I am having another baby in a month (#3 woo!) and planning what my leave will look like over the next 12 months. She asked me to reach out here and see if anyone was interested in some backfill contract work. I am an inhouse designer/developer, so its only one site (a luxury for most of you from what I hear 'round these parts)
gig would probably mainly be maintaining the site and cleaning up my accidents
developing a custom module here and there and working with lead gen team to help with generate LP templates and the like
I am still working out my leave timeline, so let me know if you are interested  and if you have some idea of what your next 12 months would look like
